eventDecorators.name: OwnershipTransferred
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when a Uniswap V3 LP token has been unstaked.

eventDecorators.name: PaidReferral
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when a Uniswap V3 LP token has been unstaked.

eventDecorators.name: SetOnlyRewardActiveReferrers
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when a Uniswap V3 LP token has been unstaked.

eventDecorators.name: SetReferralDistribution
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when a Uniswap V3 LP token has been unstaked.

eventDecorators.name: SetReferralPercentage
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when a Uniswap V3 LP token has been unstaked.

eventDecorators.name: SetReferralsEnabled
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when a Uniswap V3 LP token has been unstaked.

eventDecorators.name: UpdatedUserLastActiveTime
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when a Uniswap V3 LP token has been unstaked.

functionDecorators.name: getRefereeBonusRate
functionDecorators.description: Given a user amount to calc in which rate period.

functionDecorators.name: getTime
functionDecorators.description: Get block timestamp with function for testing mock.

functionDecorators.name: hasReferrer
functionDecorators.description: Check whether a specific address has a referrer.

functionDecorators.name: hasReferrer
functionDecorators.description: Check if the caller has a referrer.

functionDecorators.name: isOwner
functionDecorators.description: Returns true if the caller is the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: isReferralsEnabled
functionDecorators.description: Read whether Referrals payout is enabled or not.

returnDecorators.description: whether referral payout is enabled or not (default: true).

functionDecorators.name: isReferrerActive
functionDecorators.description: Check whether the provided address is considered 'active'.

parameterDecorators.name: _accountAddress
parameterDecorators.description: Boolean indicating whether referrer is 'active' on the platform.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

functionDecorators.name: setOnlyRewardActiveReferrers
functionDecorators.description: Enable or disable inactivity check for referral payout (if set to 'true', inactive referrals don't get paid).

parameterDecorators.name: _onlyRewardActiveReferrers
parameterDecorators.description: Boolean indicating whether referral payout is only paid out to active referrers (default: true).

functionDecorators.name: setReferralDistribution
functionDecorators.description: Set the distribution of referral fee between levels (default => 1: 60%, 2: 30%, 3: 10%).

parameterDecorators.name: _levelRate
parameterDecorators.description: The distribution per level based on decimals variable in contract (default => [6000, 3000, 1000]).

functionDecorators.name: setReferralsEnabled
functionDecorators.description: Enable or disable the Referral payout.

parameterDecorators.name: _referralsEnabled
parameterDecorators.description: Boolean indicating whether referral payout is enabled or not (default: true).

functionDecorators.name: transferFunds
functionDecorators.description: Transfer Olymps away from Referral contract if added by accident (not supposed to be called).

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
